snippet.title: Virtual Town Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Oh no, the old Mayor of Virtual Town has left under mysterious circumstances! The town is at a loss. And what a mess he left! Move to Virtual Town and take the role of Mayor in this open-world simulation by Last Day of Work (creator of Virtual Families and Virtual Villagers). Bring the town back to its old glory! Hire a secretary, raise a child as your little helper and successor, meet all the interesting and quirky residents and help them in their quests. Grow food and keep the town fed. Restore and arrange the town to your liking. Add statues, fountains. Build a big garden. It’s a living, breathing world, and it is full of surprises! Join us, in Virtual Town.

PLEASE NOTE: 
Available now on the Amazon App store for Kindle Fire and Android devices  http://www.amazon.com/Last-Day-of-Work-Virtual/dp/B016ZZGRFK/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1449948726&sr=8-1&keywords=virtual+town
On Apple App Store and Google Play right around Christmas, so stay tuned!

FEATURES
* Manage a living, breathing town.
* Meet interesting, quirky residents. Make friends! Make enemies!
* Dynamic weather, seasons, and moon phases. Watch their little world change just like your own!
* Collect dozens of rare insects, gems, and botanical species. 
* Restore the town Museum.
* Build and decorate your crib. Make it awesome. Fill it with stuff.
* Adopt a needy child, to raise as your own. Train her to help out, and eventually take over when you retire as Mayor.
*Uncover the secrets of Virtual Town. Where did the original Mayor go? Why did he leave?
